Posts.Content: Hi Amanda, I'm in the exact same position. Got notice of the call back last Friday and I'm in today- my wedding anniversary of all days. I've done my best to keep calm. But I'm frightened too. I know it might be fine but then it might not be. I'm 49 and this was my first mammogram too. I have no lumps and feel fine but I know you don't have to have a lump to have it. Praying, can't sleep. Since the weekend my breasts have felt more tender. Is that me being paranoid, over examining? Sorry I can't say much to reassure but at least you know you are not alone. Good luck on Thursday. Report
Posts.Title: Mammogram callback

Posts.Content: I am 52 and have just had my first mammogram All went well although very painful At the time the technician mentioned it was not uncommon to have a callback Well today I received that callback and boy am I freaking out They just said they would like to see me As they will do another mammogram and ultrasound on my left breast I will go this coming Thursday Has anyone else been called back after first mammogram I know sometimes it's due to density in the breast but they don't tell you anything m 0 likes, 4 replies Report
Posts.Title: Mammogram callback

Posts.Content: Thanks Sally I have been the exact same all of a sudden my left breast bugging me Obviously we are paranoid Good luck today and happy anniversary Sending you massive hugs Report
